content.question: Which of the following is played?

choices.label: Two measures of music in bass clef, six-eight time. The key signature has one flat, B-flat. The notes are eighth A3, sixteenth notes B-flat3, A3, eighth notes G3, F3, sixteenth notes D3, E3, F3, G3, dotted eighth A3, sixteenth B-flat3, eighth G3, dotted quarter A3.

content.answer: Two measures of music in bass clef, six-eight time. The key signature has one flat, B-flat. The notes are eighth A3, sixteenth notes B-flat3, A3, eighth notes G3, F3, sixteenth notes D3, E3, F3, G3, dotted eighth A3, sixteenth B-flat3, eighth G3, dotted quarter A3.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
